metadata.description:
This dataset contains the flux measurements from the Zhangye wetland station eddy covariance system (EC) in the midstream reaches of the Heihe integrated observatory network from January 1 to December 31 in 2018. The site (100.44640° E, 38.97514° N) was located in the Zhangye City in Gansu Province. The elevation is 1460 m. The EC was installed at a height of 5.2 m, and the sampling rate was 10 Hz. The sonic anemometer faced north, and the separation distance between the sonic anemometer and the CO2/H2O gas analyzer (Gill&Li7500A) was 0.25 m.
The raw data acquired at 10 Hz were processed using the Eddypro post-processing software, including the spike detection, lag correction of H2O/CO2 relative to the vertical wind component, sonic virtual temperature correction, coordinate rotation (2-D rotation), corrections for density fluctuation (Webb-Pearman-Leuning correction), and frequency response correction. The EC data were subsequently averaged over 30 min periods. The observation data quality was divided into three classes according to the quality assessment method of stationarity (Δst) and the integral turbulent characteristics test (ITC): class 1-3 (high quality), class 4-6 (good), class 7-8 (poor, better than gap filling data), class9 (rejected). In addition to the above processing steps, the half-hourly flux data were screened in a four-step procedure: (1) data from periods of sensor malfunction were rejected; (2) data collected before or after 1 h of precipitation were rejected; (3) incomplete 30 min data were rejected when the missing data constituted more than 3% of the 30 min raw record. There were 48 records per day, and the missing data were replaced with -6999. Suspicious data were marked in red. Flux data during March 25 to May 10, 2018 were wrong to the sensor malfunction.
The released data contained the following variables: data/time, wind direction (Wdir, °), wind speed (Wnd, m/s), the standard deviation of the lateral wind (Std_Uy, m/s), virtual temperature (Tv, ℃), H2O mass density (H2O, g/m3), CO2 mass density (CO2, mg/m3), friction velocity (ustar, m/s), stability (z/L), sensible heat flux (Hs, W/m2), latent heat flux (LE, W/m2), carbon dioxide flux (Fc, mg/ (m2s)), quality assessment of the sensible heat flux (QA_Hs), quality assessment of the latent heat flux (QA_LE), and quality assessment of the carbon flux (QA_Fc). In this dataset, the time of 0:30 corresponds to the average data for the period between 0:00 and 0:30; the data were stored in *.xls format. Detailed information can be found in the suggested references.
For more information, please refer to Liu et al. (2018) (for sites information), Liu et al. (2011) for data processing) in the Citation section.

该数据集包含了2018年1月1日至2018年12月31日的黑河水文气象观测网中游张掖湿地站涡动相关仪观测数据。站点位于甘肃省张掖市，下垫面是湿地。观测点的经纬度是100.44640E, 38.97514N，海拔1460.00m。涡动相关仪的架高5.2m，采样频率是10Hz，超声朝向是正北向，超声风速温度仪（Gill）与CO2/H2O分析仪(Li7500A)之间的距离是25cm。
涡动相关仪的原始观测数据为10Hz，发布的数据是采用Eddypro软件处理的30分钟数据，其处理的主要步骤包括：野点值剔除，延迟时间校正，坐标旋转（二次坐标旋转），频率响应修正，超声虚温修正和密度（WPL）修正等。同时对各通量值进行质量评价，主要是大气平稳性（Δst）和湍流相似性特征（ITC）的检验。对Eddypro软件输出的30min通量值也进行了筛选：（1）剔除仪器出错时的数据；（2）剔除降水前后1h的数据；（3）剔除10Hz原始数据中每30min内缺失率大于10%的数据。观测数据的平均周期为30分钟，一天48个数据，缺失数据标记为-6999。3月25日-5月10日涡动系统的Li7500A出现问题，通量数据异常。
发布的观测数据包括：日期/时间Date/Time，风向Wdir（°），水平风速Wnd（m/s），侧向风速标准差Std_Uy（m/s），超声虚温Tv（℃），水汽密度H2O（g/m3），二氧化碳浓度CO2（mg/m3），摩擦速度Ustar（m/s），奥布霍夫长度L（m），感热通量Hs（W/m2），潜热通量LE（W/m2），二氧化碳通量Fc（mg/(m2s)），感热通量的质量标识QA_Hs，潜热通量的质量标识QA_LE，二氧化碳通量的质量标识QA_Fc。感热、潜热、二氧化碳通量的质量标识分为九级（质量标识1-3数据质量好，4-6数据质量较好，7-8数据质量较差（较插补数据好）；9数据质量差））。数据时间的含义，如0:30代表0:00-0:30的平均；数据以*.xls格式存储。
黑河流域地表过程综合观测网或站点信息请参考Liu et al. (2018)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al. (2011)。

background: The two-source energy balance (TSEB) model was successfully applied to estimate evaporation (E), transpiration (T), and evapotranspiration (ET) for land covered with vegetation, which has significantly important applications for the terrestrial water cycle and water resource management. One-source evapotranspiration estimation models combine the soil–vegetation components into a single source. However, in real landscape conditions, the surface is heterogeneous and contains a mixture of soil and vegetation having different temperatures and resistance to energy exchange. Therefore, one-source models explicitly cannot estimate the surface evapotranspiration accurately because the effect of.

Shuttleworth and Wallace proposed a typical two-source evapotranspiration estimation model in which the energy partition is assumed to occur in both “the above canopy” and “the under soil” cases. Water vapor and heat meet over the reference height in the interior of the canopy. Moreover, the mixed water vapor and heat can only exit through the top of the canopy; the total heat flux is in addition to the fluxes coming from every surface layer. However, the model is complex, having over five resistances that cannot be accurately calculated. In addition, the model includes required parameters and observations that cannot be readily obtained from operational satellite- and ground-based data; therefore, the range of applications of the model is limited.

The TSEB model has undergone several revisions, improving the estimation of soil and canopy net radiation, the aerodynamic resistance of the soil surface, the fractional vegetation coverage observed at the radiometer view angle, the distribution of regional-scale near-surface air temperature, and soil and canopy component temperatures. Because the TSEB model only requires the surface energy balance model with a single measurement of land surface temperature, the original model and subsequent refinements have been widely used to estimate E and T under a wide variety of vegetation types, vegetation coverage, climates, and spatial scales. However, most studies have only evaluated the total fluxes or ET (soil plus canopy) in comparison with measurements using the Bowen ratio–energy balance system, the eddy covariance (EC) system, or the large aperture scintillometer.

Accurately estimating surface fluxes in a strongly advective irrigated agricultural area is a particularly challenging task and is even more difficult when the EC flux measurements of H and LE have an incomplete energy balance closure with respect to the available energy Rn−G0. The previous sensitivity studies found that the TSEB model performance is mainly affected by the uncertainty in surface–air temperature difference. Sometimes, this difference is dominant due to the errors in determining the surface soil and vegetation component temperatures from the surface composite radiometric temperature. In this letter, it is shown that there is an overestimation of the component temperatures compared with the observed composite radiometric. This often leads to the most crucial effect on the TSEB model performance. In addition, another factor is the strong advective environment in this region.
research objective: In this letter, the ground-measured soil and canopy component temperatures were used to estimate E, T, and ET, which were better validated with observed ratios of E (E/ET%) and T (T/ET%) using the stable oxygen and hydrogen isotopes, and the ET measurements using an eddy covariance (EC) system.

The objective of this letter is to estimate E, T, and ET using the soil and canopy component temperatures observed via a high-resolution thermal camera as inputs to a series TSEB model and to subsequently better validate E, T, and ET using a combination of the stable oxygen and hydrogen isotope technique and EC measurements.
challenges: However, the current composite temperature separation approaches are limited in their effectiveness in arid regions. Moreover, E and T are difficult to measure on the ground.

Errors in the derived component temperature were primarily caused by image classification errors; these classification errors varied with vegetation abundance. The higher uncertainty of H estimation is not only caused by the uncertainty of the TSEB model but also due to the increased uncertainty of the EC system, which is 18% when the mean H is small in the irrigated farmland. Due to image pixel classification errors, soil pixels were counted as vegetation pixels, which produced an overestimation of the canopy temperature under the developing vegetation abundance. Alternatively, ignoring atmospheric upwelling radiation and transmittance could have produced the uncertainties in the estimated temperatures. In addition, the estimated uncertainty of the incoming short- and long-wave radiation transmittances through the canopy may be another source of Rn estimation errors.
methods: In this letter, the field observations were obtained from the Daman superstation installed in the central oasis, which is a 40-m boundary layer tower located at 100.3722° E, 38.8555° N and at an elevation of 1556 m. The meteorological parameters were measured every 10 min and included air temperature, wind speed, humidity at 5 m over the ground, four-component radiations (measured at 12 m above the ground using a four-component radiometer), and turbulent fluxes (measured at 4.5 m above the ground using an EC system with a sampling frequency of 10 Hz). The soil heat fluxes were measured using three heat plates located 6 cm under the ground. A Fluke Ti55 thermal infrared camera was manually operated on a 25-m-high platform on a boundary layer tower to measure the thermal radiation of the cropland approximately every 120 min; the observations were collected as thermal images from approximately 07:00 to 19:00 China Standard Time (CST) during the daytime. The ground-based measurement data were applied to partition ET into E and T applying the Craig–Gordon model.

To evaluate the TSEB model accurately, the soil heat flux was using the ground measurement. In addition, the soil and canopy sensible heat fluxes were estimated using the series TSEB model, and their latent heat fluxes were calculated while solving the energy balance equations (1) and (2), respectively. The soil and canopy component temperatures were calculated using the images obtained with the thermal camera. To calculate the component temperatures, the visible and NIR images were classified into soil and canopy pixels using the maximum-likelihood method. Next, the soil and canopy directional brightness temperatures were exacted from the thermal images. Finally, the thermal infrared temperatures were converted to the radiation temperatures using the incoming long-wave radiation from the sky and the soil and canopy emissivities. Next, the simulated radiometric temperatures were validated against the surface radiometric temperatures, which were calculated according to the incoming long-wave radiation observed by the four-component radiometer.
dataset: The experimental area is an artificial oasis that is covered with maize, vegetables, and orchards. Data of day of year (DOY) 170, 173, 176, 192, 195, 231, 252, and 256 were used to determine ET and the ratios of E (E/ET%) and T (T/ET%) to ET during the Multi-Scale Observation Experiment on Evapotranspiration over heterogeneous land surfaces, which was part of the Heihe Water Allied Telemetry Experimental Research (HiWATER-MUSOEXE).
findings: Our results indicated that even under the strongly advective conditions, the TSEB model produced reliable estimates of the E/ET% and T/ET% ratios and of ET. The mean bias and root-mean-square error (RMSE) of E/ET% were 1% and 2%, respectively, and the mean bias and RMSE of T/ET% were −1% and 2%, respectively. In addition, the model exhibited relatively reliable estimates in the latent heat flux, with mean bias and RMSE values of 31 and 61 W·m−2, respectively, compared with the measurements from the EC system. These results demonstrated that a robust soil and vegetation component temperature calculation was crucial for estimating E, T, and ET. Moreover, the separate validation of E/ET% and T/ET% provides a good prospect for TSEB model improvements.

Our results demonstrated that the TSEB model using soil and canopy component radiometric temperatures, which were obtained from a high-precision thermal infrared camera, can be applied in a strongly advection-irrigated agricultural area. Notably, the results illustrated that the latent fluxes of the soil and vegetation components were successfully separated with reasonable accuracy, as assessed using ground-based measurements. The estimated E/ET% and E/ET% values agreed well with the values observed using the stable oxygen and hydrogen isotopes technique during the early, middle, and late growing seasons. In addition, the TSEB model produced reliable estimations of Rn, H, and LE; the mean biases of Rn, H, and LE were −18, 5, and 31 W ·m−2, respectively, and the RMSEs of Rn, H, and LE were 29, 19, and 61 W · m−2, respectively. This finding suggests that given accurate soil and vegetation component temperatures, E and T can be accurately separated from ET using the TSEB model.
backgroundCn: 双源能量平衡（TSEB）模型成功应用于估算植被覆盖土地的蒸发（E）、蒸腾（T）和蒸散发（ET），这对陆地水循环和水资源管理具有重要意义。单源蒸散发估算模型将土壤-植被组件合并为一个单一源。然而，在真实的景观条件下，表面是异质的，包含具有不同温度和能量交换阻力的土壤和植被混合物。因此，单源模型显然无法准确估算表面蒸散发，因为其影响。

Shuttleworth和Wallace提出了一种典型的双源蒸散发估算模型，该模型假设能量分配发生在“树冠上方”和“土壤下方”两种情况下。水蒸气和热量在树冠内部的参考高度相遇。此外，混合的水蒸气和热量只能通过树冠顶部排出；总热通量是除了来自每个表层的通量之外的额外通量。然而，该模型较为复杂，具有超过五个无法准确计算的阻力。此外，该模型还包括一些所需的参数和观测数据，这些数据无法从操作性卫星和地面数据中轻易获得；因此，该模型的应用范围受到限制。

TSEB模型经过多次修订，改善了土壤和冠层净辐射的估算、土壤表面的气动阻力、在辐射仪视角下观察到的植被覆盖度、区域尺度近地面气温的分布以及土壤和冠层组分的温度。由于TSEB模型只需要一个地表温度的单一测量来进行表面能量平衡模型的计算，因此原始模型及其后续改进已广泛用于在各种植被类型、植被覆盖、气候和空间尺度下估算蒸散发（E）和温度（T）。然而，大多数研究仅评估了总通量或蒸散发（土壤加冠层），并与使用波恩比–能量平衡系统、涡度协方差（EC）系统或大孔径闪烁仪的测量结果进行了比较。

在强烈对流的灌溉农业区域，准确估计表面通量是一项特别具有挑战性的任务，尤其是在涡度协方差（EC）通量测量的潜热（LE）和显热（H）与可用能量（Rn−G0）之间存在能量平衡闭合不完全的情况下。之前的敏感性研究发现，TSEB模型的性能主要受到表面-空气温差不确定性的影响。有时，这种温差由于从表面复合辐射温度中确定表面土壤和植被组分温度的误差而占主导地位。本文显示，与观测的复合辐射温度相比，组分温度存在过高估计的情况。这往往对TSEB模型的性能产生最关键的影响。此外，该区域的强对流环境也是一个重要因素。
research objectiveCn: 在这封信中，地面测量的土壤和冠层成分温度被用来估算蒸散（E）、蒸发（T）和蒸散量（ET），这些估算通过稳定的氧和氢同位素以及使用涡度协方差（EC）系统的ET测量结果进行了更好的验证，得到了E（E/ET%）和T（T/ET%）的观察比率。
这封信的目的是利用高分辨率热像仪观察到的土壤和冠层组件温度作为输入，通过一系列TSEB模型来估算蒸散（E）、蒸发（T）和蒸散发（ET），并随后结合稳定氧和氢同位素技术以及涡动相关（EC）测量来更好地验证E、T和ET。
challengesCn: 然而，目前的复合温度分离方法在干旱地区的有效性有限。此外，E和T在地面上难以测量。

导出组件温度的误差主要是由于图像分类错误造成的；这些分类错误随着植被丰度的变化而变化。H估计的不确定性不仅是由于TSEB模型的不确定性，还因为在灌溉农田中，当平均H较小时，EC系统的不确定性达到了18%。由于图像像素分类错误，土壤像素被错误地计为植被像素，这导致在植被丰度发展的情况下，冠层温度被高估。另一方面，忽略大气上行辐射和透射率可能导致估计温度的不确定性。此外，估计的通过冠层的短波和长波辐射透射率的不确定性可能是Rn估计误差的另一个来源。
methodsCn: 在这封信中，现场观测数据来自于安装在中央绿洲的达曼超级站，该站是一座40米高的边界层塔，位于东经100.3722°，北纬38.8555°，海拔1556米。气象参数每10分钟测量一次，包括离地5米处的气温、风速和湿度，12米高处使用四分量辐射计测量的四分量辐射，以及使用10 Hz采样频率的涡度通量（在离地4.5米处测量）。土壤热通量通过位于地下6厘米的三个热板进行测量。一台Fluke Ti55热红外相机在边界层塔的25米高平台上手动操作，约每120分钟测量一次农田的热辐射；观测数据在中国标准时间（CST）白天的07:00至19:00之间收集为热图像。基于地面测量数据，应用Craig-Gordon模型将蒸散发（ET）分解为蒸发（E）和蒸腾（T）。

为了准确评估TSEB模型，土壤热通量使用地面测量数据。此外，土壤和冠层的感热通量是通过系列TSEB模型估算的，而它们的潜热通量则通过求解能量平衡方程（1）和（2）来计算。土壤和冠层的组件温度是使用热像仪获得的图像计算的。为了计算组件温度，使用最大似然法将可见光和近红外图像分类为土壤和冠层像素。接下来，从热图像中提取土壤和冠层的方向亮温。最后，利用来自天空的入射长波辐射和土壤及冠层的发射率，将热红外温度转换为辐射温度。最后，模拟的辐射温度与根据四分量辐射计观测的入射长波辐射计算的表面辐射温度进行了验证。
datasetCn: 实验区域是一个人工绿洲，种植有玉米、蔬菜和果园。使用了第170、173、176、192、195、231、252和256天的数据来确定蒸散发（ET）以及蒸发（E/ET%）和蒸腾（T/ET%）相对于蒸散发的比率，这些研究是在多尺度蒸散发观测实验中进行的，该实验是河西水文遥感实验研究（HiWATER-MUSOEXE）的一部分。
findingsCn: 我们的结果表明，即使在强烈的对流条件下，TSEB模型仍然能够可靠地估计E/ET%和T/ET%比率以及ET。E/ET%的平均偏差和均方根误差（RMSE）分别为1%和2%；而T/ET%的平均偏差和RMSE分别为−1%和2%。此外，该模型在潜热通量的估计上也表现出相对可靠的结果，与EC系统的测量值相比，平均偏差和RMSE值分别为31和61 W·m−2。这些结果表明，稳健的土壤和植被组件温度计算对于估计E、T和ET至关重要。此外，E/ET%和T/ET%的单独验证为TSEB模型的改进提供了良好的前景。

我们的结果表明，使用高精度热红外相机获得的土壤和冠层组件辐射温度的TSEB模型可以应用于强烈的平流灌溉农业区域。值得注意的是，结果表明土壤和植被组件的潜在通量成功地以合理的精度分离，经过地面测量的评估。估计的E/ET%和E/ET%值与在早期、中期和晚期生长季节使用稳定氧和氢同位素技术观察到的值很好地一致。此外，TSEB模型对Rn、H和LE的估计也很可靠；Rn、H和LE的平均偏差分别为−18、5和31 W·m−2，Rn、H和LE的均方根误差（RMSE）分别为29、19和61 W·m−2。这一发现表明，在给定准确的土壤和植被组件温度的情况下，可以使用TSEB模型准确地将E和T从ET中分离出来。

background: Arid and semiarid regions represent approximately 30 % of the global terrestrial surface area (Dregne, 1991; Scanlon et al., 2006), and dryland expansion occurs under climate change, especially in developing countries (Huang et al., 2016). An oasis is a unique ecological landscape in arid and semi-arid areas that is not only the core of regions’ ecological environment but also the foundation of their economic development, especially in western China, which has been an important part of the “Silk Road” since ancient times. Oases comprising less than 10 % of the total area of arid regions support more than 90 % of the population in these regions of China (Chu et al., 2005; Li et al., 2016; Zhou et al., 2022). The oasis–desert system plays a crucial role in maintaining a stable ecological environment and agricultural productivity (Zhang and Zhao, 2015). Extensive studies have investigated energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas based on field and remote-sensing observations (Taha et al., 1991; Potchter et al., 2008; Xue et al., 2019; Wang et al., 2019; Zhou et al., 2022) and numerical simulations (Chu et al., 2005; Meng et al., 2009; Georgescu et al., 2011; Liu et al., 2020). In addition, oasis–desert areas located in semiarid regions have been found to be carbon sinks by previous researchers (Tagesson et al., 2016; Wang et al., 2019); thus, they can significantly affect the carbon balance of arid regions and play an increasingly important role within the global carbon cycle.
research objective: Therefore, it is critical to maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems in order to achieve the goal of sustainable oasis development. Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is important to achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in the oasis–desert area and support the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis. A quantitative understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas is crucial to recognize the oasis–desert interactions and is significant to protect the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases; moreover, long-term observations are indispensable.
challenges: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas are facing the crisis of ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, the degradation of natural vegetation, the intensification of land desertification, and the frequent occurrence of dust storms, especially in many inland river basins westward along the Silk Road, such as the Tarim River basin (Zhao et al., 2013), the Aral Sea basin (Stanev et al., 2004; Crétaux et al., 2009), and the Lake Urmia basin (Stone, 2015).
methods: In this study, we present a suite of observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems that consist of long-term energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes as well as auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters from 2012 to 2021. Half-hourly turbulent flux data were acquired by an eddy covariance system and scintillometer. The hydrometeorological data (including radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles; gradients of air temperature and humidity and of wind speed and direction; and air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles) were observed from automatic weather stations with a 10 min average period as well as the groundwater table data. Moreover, vegetation and soil parameters were also supplemented in the datasets. The data processing and quality control procedure can be divided into data collection, data processing, and data archiving and sharing.
dataset: The study area comprises the middle and lower reaches of the HRB, located in the arid regions of western China, that receive water from the typical cryosphere of the upper reaches. A total of 11 land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in these regions since 2012 – 2 superstations and 9 ordinary stations. The dataset of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas reported in this study (including energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes; hydrometeorological data; and vegetation and soil parameters) is freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
backgroundCn: 干旱和半干旱地区约占全球陆地表面积的30%（Dregne, 1991；Scanlon et al., 2006），在气候变化的影响下，干旱地区的扩展尤其发生在发展中国家（Huang et al., 2016）。绿洲是干旱和半干旱地区独特的生态景观，不仅是这些地区生态环境的核心，也是经济发展的基础，特别是在中国西部，自古以来就一直是“丝绸之路”的重要组成部分。绿洲占干旱地区总面积的不到10%，却支持了中国这些地区90%以上的人口（Chu et al., 2005；Li et al., 2016；Zhou et al., 2022）。绿洲-沙漠系统在维持稳定的生态环境和农业生产力方面发挥着至关重要的作用（Zhang and Zhao, 2015）。大量研究基于实地和遥感观测（Taha et al., 1991；Potchter et al., 2008；Xue et al., 2019；Wang et al., 2019；Zhou et al., 2022）以及数值模拟（Chu et al., 2005；Meng et al., 2009；Georgescu et al., 2011；Liu et al., 2020）对绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换进行了广泛研究。此外，位于半干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠区域已被前期研究者发现是碳汇（Tagesson et al., 2016；Wang et al., 2019）；因此，它们可以显著影响干旱地区的碳平衡，并在全球碳循环中发挥越来越重要的作用。
research objectiveCn: 因此，保持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续绿洲发展的目标至关重要。了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，对于实现绿洲-沙漠地区的碳达峰和碳中和目标，以及支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展是非常重要的。对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解，对于认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用，保护生态稳定性和绿洲的社会经济发展具有重要意义；此外，长期观测是不可或缺的。
challengesCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态环境退化的危机，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及沙尘暴频繁发生，尤其是在丝绸之路沿线的许多内陆河流流域，如塔里木河流域（赵等，2013）、咸海流域（Stanev等，2004；Crétaux等，2009）和乌尔米湖流域（Stone，2015）。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，我们展示了一套来自人工和自然绿洲-沙漠系统的观测数据集，包括2012年至2021年的长期能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。半小时的湍流通量数据通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取。水文气象数据（包括辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面；空气温度和湿度的梯度、风速和风向的梯度；以及气压、降水和土壤湿度剖面）通过自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期观测，同时也记录了地下水位数据。此外，数据集中还补充了植被和土壤参数。数据处理和质量控制程序可分为数据收集、数据处理和数据归档与共享。
datasetCn: 研究区域包括位于中国西部干旱地区的HRB中下游，水源来自上游典型的冰冻圈。自2012年以来，在这些地区建立了11个地表通量和气象站，包括2个超级站和9个普通站。本研究报告的绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换观测数据集（包括能量、水汽和碳通量；水文气象数据；以及植被和土壤参数）可从国家西藏高原数据中心免费获取。

background: Accurate monitoring of surface fluxes over land surfaces is necessary for global climate change research, ecological environment management, and agricultural and water resource planning. The magnitude of the surface flux is largely determined by vegetation parameters, soil moisture and other states of the land surface. The major methods used for estimating surface fluxes are field measurement, remote-sensing-based methods, and land surface modeling. The variability in field measurements of surface flux has been documented over diurnal, seasonal, and inter-annual time scales.

Land surface models have been rapidly developed to predict surface fluxes on continuous spatial and temporal scales with physical constraints. Regardless of their specific model structures, all land surface models require observational data to calibrate their parameters and adjust their states. New techniques such as data assimilation are needed to integrate either field or remotely sensed observations with the models, thus improving model accuracy by correcting the model state variables and parameters. Data assimilation has played an increasingly important role in improving predictions of such land surface state variables as the leaf area index, soil temperature profile, soil moisture profile, and other related variables, e.g., surface fluxes.

Spatially distributed estimates of surface flux can be obtained from remote-sensing-based methods. The surface fluxes also can be obtained based on variational techniques and relatively simple models with the assimilation of field-measured land surface temperatures. In a land surface model, the sensible and latent heat fluxes are diagnostic variables, and they are affected by many factors (e.g., model states and parameters). As a new-generation Chinese polar orbiting meteorological satellite, the FY-3 series consists of two experimental (FY-3A/B) and at least four operational satellites (FY-3C/D/E/F). The FY-3 series is expected to have a service life that lasts until 2020. The FY-3A was launched in the year 2008. Visible and infrared radiometer (VIRR) is one of the 11 sensors mounted on the FY-3A satellite and has a nominal spatial resolution of approximately 1 km×1 km at the nadir. The common land model (CoLM) is a state-of-the-art model developed by many groups and validated with extensive field data sites. In CoLM, soil moisture is important for dividing the net radiation into the ground heat, sensible, and latent heat fluxes.

Inaccurate surface flux predictions are highly correlated with errors in land surface temperature estimates. Generally, the diurnal variation trends of the land surface temperature and surface flux can be predicted correctly using the CoLM. The daily averaged evaporation fraction (EF, ratio between latent heat flux and available energy) can be used to describe the splitting of available energy into sensible and latent heat fluxes. The LAS instrument can measure the sensible heat flux at a larger scale than the EC system.
research objective: In this work, a dual-pass data assimilation scheme is developed to improve predictions of surface flux.

The current study constructed a dual-pass data assimilation scheme with an ensemble Kalman filter (EnKF) to improve the surface flux predictions with assimilation of remotely sensed land surface temperature. This study carried out the first experiment to assimilate remotely sensed land surface temperatures (LST) derived from FY3A-VIRR into a land surface model.

In this study, a dual-pass data assimilation scheme was constructed to estimate the surface fluxes via the independent optimization of the soil moisture and vegetation parameters. The aim of this study was to eliminate or reduce the errors between the model simulation and observation.
challenges: Methods are difficult to use for continuous monitoring of surface fluxes because the data derived from satellites are instantaneous and often contaminated by the presence of clouds.

However, these measurements are difficult to use for monitoring surface fluxes at the regional scale because they only produce either point or patch-scale data. The deviations between the FY3A-VIRR LST data and the ground measurements are determined by many factors. The terrain effect can affect the accuracy of the FY3A-VIRR LST retrievals. The mismatch of the spatial and temporal scales between the FY3A-VIRR and field-measured LST can also cause these biases.

The differences between the sensible heat fluxes measured by the EC and LAS system are primarily caused by the energy imbalance of the EC, the heterogeneity of the underlying surfaces, and the differences between the source areas of the EC and LAS measurements. Because of the short memory of the land surface temperature, it is difficult to assimilate the land surface temperatures. Directly assimilating land surface temperature to optimize soil moisture may cause model simulations that are more unstable.
methods: In this work, a dual-pass data assimilation scheme is developed to improve predictions of surface flux. Pass 1 of the dual-pass data assimilation scheme optimizes the model vegetation parameters at the weekly temporal scale, and Pass 2 optimizes the soil moisture at the daily temporal scale. Based on ensemble Kalman filter (EnKF), the land surface temperature (LST) data derived from the new generation of Chinese meteorology satellite (FY3A-VIRR) are assimilated into common land model (CoLM) for the first time. Six sites, Daman, Guantao, Arou, BJ, Miyun and Jiyuan, are selected for the data assimilation experiments and include different climatological conditions.

The dual-pass data assimilation technique employed in this study optimizes the model states and parameters independently. The two passes of the scheme assimilate the remotely sensed land surface temperatures (LST) derived from the FY3A satellite. With the assimilation of the FY3A-VIRR LST data, Pass 1 is used to optimize the model parameters at the weekly temporal scale, and Pass 2 is used to optimize the soil moisture at the daily temporal scale. Six Chinese flux observation sites with different land cover types (alpine meadow, grassland, cropland, and orchard) were selected to conduct the data assimilation experiments. The FY3A-VIRR LST data are compared with the ground measurements.

In this study, the MODIS LAI products are incorporated directly into the model, and the vegetation parameters are optimized at the weekly temporal scale with Pass 1 of the dual-pass data assimilation scheme. At the daily temporal scale, the soil moisture is optimized with Pass 2 of the dual-pass data assimilation scheme. The land surface temperature data from the new generation Chinese meteorology satellite FY3A-VIRR were assimilated into CoLM for the first time based on the EnKF algorithm. The source areas of the LAS measurements were calculated using a footprint model and overlaid with a FY3A-VIRR pixel.
dataset: The land surface temperature (LST) data derived from the new generation of Chinese meteorology satellite (FY3A-VIRR) are assimilated into common land model (CoLM) for the first time. Six sites, Daman, Guantao, Arou, BJ, Miyun and Jiyuan, are selected for the data assimilation experiments and include different climatological conditions. The results are compared with those from a dataset generated by a multi-scale surface flux observation system that includes an automatic weather station (AWS), eddy covariance (EC) and large aperture scintillometer (LAS).

The FY-3A land surface temperature data will become the new data source for global water and energy balance research. The FY3A-VIRR LST products can provide the LST and emissivity of each pixel, and the data are stored in a hierarchical data format (HDF), which is a sinusoidal projection with a spatial resolution of 1 km. Data from six sites located in three major nature zones (western arid and semi-arid area, eastern monsoon area, and Qinghai-Tibet alpine meadow) of People’s Republic of China (PRC) are used for the data assimilation experiments.
findings: The results indicate that the dual-pass data assimilation scheme is able to reduce model uncertainties and improve predictions of surface flux with the assimilation of FY3A-VIRR LST data.

The dual-pass data assimilation scheme reduced the model uncertainties and improved the prediction abilities of the model. The average BIAS values of the six sites changed from 28.7 to 5.3 W m 2 and from 16.9 to 16.1 W m2; the average RMSE values dropped from 71.7 to 46.8 W m 2 and from 93.7 to 70.8 W m 2; and the average R-values increased from 0.75 to 0.78 and from 0.66 to 0.82, respectively. The average BIAS values of the assimilation EF results dropped from 0.21 to 0.01, the average RMSE values dropped from 0.31 to 0.15, and the average R-values increased from 0.43 to 0.73. The comparisons showed that the assimilation results match well against the LAS measurements, and the correlations between the assimilation results and LAS measurements were higher than that of the model simulations at the Daman, Guantao, Arou, BJ, and Jiyuan sites.
backgroundCn: 对陆地表面通量的准确监测对于全球气候变化研究、生态环境管理以及农业和水资源规划是必要的。表面通量的大小在很大程度上取决于植被参数、土壤湿度和其他陆地表面的状态。估算表面通量的主要方法包括现场测量、基于遥感的方法和陆面模型。现场测量的表面通量在日变化、季节变化和年际变化的时间尺度上存在变异性。
陆面模型的快速发展使其能够在连续的空间和时间尺度上预测表面通量，并具备物理约束。无论其具体模型结构如何，所有陆面模型都需要观测数据来校准其参数和调整其状态。新的技术，如数据同化，亟需将现场或遥感观测与模型相结合，从而通过修正模型状态变量和参数来提高模型的准确性。数据同化在改善陆面状态变量的预测方面发挥了越来越重要的作用，例如叶面积指数、土壤温度剖面、土壤湿度剖面以及其他相关变量，如表面通量。

空间分布的表面通量估计可以通过基于遥感的方法获得。表面通量也可以通过变分技术和相对简单的模型结合现场测量的地表温度进行同化来获得。在陆面模型中，显热和潜热通量是诊断变量，受许多因素（例如模型状态和参数）的影响。作为新一代中国极轨气象卫星，FY-3系列包括两颗实验卫星（FY-3A/B）和至少四颗运营卫星（FY-3C/D/E/F）。FY-3系列预计服务寿命将持续到2020年。FY-3A于2008年发射。可见光和红外辐射仪（VIRR）是FY-3A卫星上安装的11个传感器之一，具有约1 km×1 km的标称空间分辨率（在天顶方向）。共同陆面模型（CoLM）是由多个团队开发的先进模型，并经过广泛的现场数据验证。在CoLM中，土壤湿度对于将净辐射分配到地面热、显热和潜热通量中非常重要。
不准确的表面通量预测与地表温度估计的误差高度相关。一般来说，CoLM能够正确预测地表温度和表面通量的日变化趋势。日均蒸发分数（EF，即潜热通量与可用能量的比率）可以用来描述可用能量在显热通量和潜热通量之间的分配。LAS仪器能够在比EC系统更大范围内测量显热通量。
research objectiveCn: 在这项工作中，开发了一种双重通道数据同化方案，以改善对表面通量的预测。
本研究构建了一种双重数据同化方案，采用集合卡尔曼滤波器（EnKF）来改善表面通量预测，结合了遥感地表温度的同化。本研究首次进行实验，将来自FY3A-VIRR的遥感地表温度（LST）同化到陆面模型中。
在这项研究中，构建了一种双重数据同化方案，通过独立优化土壤湿度和植被参数来估计表面通量。该研究的目的是消除或减少模型模拟与观测之间的误差。
challengesCn: 由于卫星获取的数据是瞬时的，并且常常受到云层的干扰，因此对于表面通量的连续监测，方法的使用是困难的。
然而，这些测量数据在区域尺度上监测表面通量时很难使用，因为它们只能产生点或斑块尺度的数据。FY3A-VIRR LST 数据与地面测量之间的偏差受到许多因素的影响。地形效应可能会影响 FY3A-VIRR LST 检索的准确性。FY3A-VIRR 与现场测量的 LST 之间的空间和时间尺度不匹配也可能导致这些偏差。
通过EC和LAS系统测量的显热通量之间的差异主要是由于EC的能量不平衡、底层表面的异质性以及EC和LAS测量的源区之间的差异。由于地表温度的短期记忆，直接同化地表温度以优化土壤湿度可能会导致模型模拟变得更加不稳定。
methodsCn: 在这项工作中，开发了一种双重数据同化方案，以改善地表通量的预测。双重数据同化方案的第一阶段在周时间尺度上优化模型植被参数，第二阶段在日时间尺度上优化土壤湿度。基于集成卡尔曼滤波器（EnKF），首次将新一代中国气象卫星（FY3A-VIRR）获取的地表温度（LST）数据同化到通用陆面模型（CoLM）中。选择了六个站点，分别是大满、馆陶、阿柔、北京、密云和济源，进行数据同化实验，这些站点具有不同的气候条件。
本研究采用的双重数据同化技术独立优化模型状态和参数。该方案的两个阶段同化来自FY3A卫星的遥感地表温度（LST）。在同化FY3A-VIRR LST数据的过程中，第一阶段用于在周时间尺度上优化模型参数，第二阶段用于在日时间尺度上优化土壤湿度。选择了六个不同土地覆盖类型（高山草甸、草地、农田和果园）的中国通量观测站进行数据同化实验。FY3A-VIRR LST数据与地面测量结果进行了比较。
在本研究中，MODIS LAI 产品直接纳入模型中，植被参数在每周时间尺度上通过双重数据同化方案的第一阶段进行优化。在每日时间尺度上，土壤湿度通过双重数据同化方案的第二阶段进行优化。基于EnKF算法，首次将新一代中国气象卫星FY3A-VIRR的地表温度数据同化到CoLM中。LAS测量的源区通过足迹模型计算，并与FY3A-VIRR像元叠加。
datasetCn: 来自新一代中国气象卫星（FY3A-VIRR）的地表温度（LST）数据首次被同化到通用陆地模型（CoLM）中。选择了六个站点，分别是大闸、广陶、阿柔、北京、密云和济源，进行数据同化实验，这些站点涵盖了不同的气候条件。结果与由多尺度表面通量观测系统生成的数据集进行比较，该系统包括自动气象站（AWS）、涡度协方差（EC）和大孔径闪烁仪（LAS）。
FY-3A地表温度数据将成为全球水分和能量平衡研究的新数据源。FY3A-VIRR LST产品可以提供每个像素的地表温度和发射率，数据以层次数据格式（HDF）存储，采用正弦投影，空间分辨率为1公里。来自中华人民共和国三个主要自然区域（西部干旱和半干旱地区、东部季风区和青藏高原 alpine meadow）六个站点的数据用于数据同化实验。
findingsCn: 结果表明，双通道数据同化方案能够通过同化FY3A-VIRR地表温度数据来减少模型不确定性，并改善地表通量的预测。

双重数据同化方案减少了模型的不确定性，提高了模型的预测能力。六个站点的平均偏差（BIAS）值从28.7 W m 2 变为5.3 W m 2，从 16.9 W m 2 变为16.1 W m 2；平均均方根误差（RMSE）值从71.7 W m 2 降至46.8 W m 2，从93.7 W m 2 降至70.8 W m 2；平均相关系数（R值）从0.75 增加到0.78，从0.66 增加到0.82。同化的蒸散发（EF）结果的平均偏差值从 0.21 降至 0.01，平均均方根误差值从0.31 降至0.15，平均相关系数值从0.43 增加到0.73。比较结果表明，同化结果与激光雷达（LAS）测量值匹配良好，并且同化结果与LAS测量值之间的相关性高于模型模拟在大门、馆陶、阿柔、北京和济源站点的相关性。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to measure energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于测量绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳通量的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: A data collection method used in oasis–desert ecosystems involves acquiring half-hourly turbulent flux data using an eddy covariance system and scintillometer, alongside hydrometeorological data from automatic weather stations with a 10-minute average period. This includes radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles, among other parameters.
Example.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中使用的一种数据收集方法涉及使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取半小时的湍流通量数据，同时从自动气象站获取10分钟平均周期的水文气象数据。这包括辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面等参数。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a dataset that includes both field measurements and remote sensing data for estimating surface fluxes?
Example.QuestionCn: 一个包含现场测量和遥感数据以估计表面通量的示例数据集是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of such a dataset would involve using land surface temperature data derived from the FY3A-VIRR satellite, combined with field measurements from sites with automatic weather stations, eddy covariance systems, and large aperture scintillometers. This multi-scale surface flux observation system provides data for assimilation experiments to improve surface flux predictions.
Example.AnswerCn: 这样的数据集的一个例子是使用来自FY3A-VIRR卫星的地表温度数据，结合来自自动气象站、涡度协方差系统和大孔径闪烁仪的现场测量。这种多尺度表面通量观测系统提供了用于同化实验的数据，以改善表面通量预测。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you give an example of a challenge faced in using satellite data for continuous monitoring of surface fluxes?
Example.QuestionCn: 使用卫星数据进行表面通量连续监测时面临的一个挑战的例子是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: One challenge in using satellite data for continuous monitoring of surface fluxes is that the data derived from satellites are instantaneous and can be contaminated by cloud presence. Additionally, the mismatch of spatial and temporal scales between satellite and field measurements can introduce biases in the data.
Example.AnswerCn: 使用卫星数据进行表面通量连续监测的一大挑战是，来自卫星的数据是瞬时的，并且可能受到云层存在的干扰。此外，卫星和现场测量之间的空间和时间尺度不匹配可能会引入数据偏差。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'eddy covariance system' mean in the context of data collection for surface fluxes?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在收集地表通量数据的背景下，“涡度相关系统”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: An eddy covariance system is a method used to measure and calculate vertical turbulent fluxes within the atmosphere. It involves using a combination of sensors that capture data on wind speed, temperature, and gas concentrations at high frequencies, typically 10 Hz, to estimate the exchange of energy, water vapor, and carbon dioxide between the surface and the atmosphere.
Definition.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差系统是一种用于测量和计算大气中垂直湍流通量的方法。它涉及使用一组合传感器，以高频率（通常为10 Hz）捕获风速、温度和气体浓度的数据，以估算表面与大气之间的能量、水蒸气和二氧化碳的交换。

Definition.QuestionEn: What are 'component temperatures' in the context of estimating evapotranspiration using the TSEB model?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在使用TSEB模型估算蒸散的背景下，“组分温度”是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Component temperatures refer to the separate temperatures of the soil and canopy as observed through thermal imaging. These temperatures are used as inputs in the Two-Source Energy Balance (TSEB) model to estimate evaporation, transpiration, and overall evapotranspiration by distinguishing between the contributions of soil and vegetation.
Definition.AnswerCn: 组件温度是指通过热成像观察到的土壤和冠层的独立温度。这些温度作为输入用于双源能量平衡（TSEB）模型，以通过区分土壤和植被的贡献来估算蒸发、蒸腾和整体蒸散。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'dual-pass data assimilation scheme' entail in the context of improving surface flux predictions?
Definition.QuestionCn: “二次数据同化方案”在改善表面通量预测的背景下，涉及到什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: A dual-pass data assimilation scheme is a method used to enhance the accuracy of surface flux predictions by independently optimizing model states and parameters. It involves two passes where the first pass optimizes vegetation parameters on a weekly scale, and the second pass optimizes soil moisture on a daily scale, using data assimilation techniques such as the ensemble Kalman filter (EnKF) with remote sensing data like land surface temperature.
Definition.AnswerCn: 双重通道数据同化方案是一种通过独立优化模型状态和参数来提高表面通量预测准确性的方法。该方案包括两个阶段，第一阶段在每周尺度上优化植被参数，第二阶段在每日尺度上优化土壤湿度，使用数据同化技术，如集成卡尔曼滤波（EnKF），结合遥感数据，如地表温度。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in challenges faced when using remote sensing-based methods versus field measurement techniques for monitoring surface fluxes in arid regions?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 使用遥感方法与现场测量技术监测干旱地区表面通量时面临的挑战有哪些不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Remote sensing-based methods face challenges such as instantaneous data collection, cloud contamination, and spatial-temporal mismatches, making continuous monitoring difficult. In contrast, field measurement techniques like eddy covariance systems can provide point or patch-scale data but struggle with issues like energy imbalance and the heterogeneity of underlying surfaces.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 基于遥感的方法面临着瞬时数据收集、云污染和时空不匹配等挑战，使得连续监测变得困难。相比之下，像涡度协方差系统这样的现场测量技术可以提供点或斑块尺度的数据，但在能量不平衡和基础表面的异质性等问题上也存在困难。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What challenges might arise in using remote sensing data alongside ground-based measurements to improve surface flux predictions?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在使用遥感数据与地面测量数据结合以改善表面通量预测时，可能会出现哪些挑战？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Challenges include discrepancies between the spatial and temporal scales of satellite data and ground measurements, as well as potential errors caused by atmospheric conditions affecting remote sensing data. Additionally, terrain effects and cloud cover can impact the accuracy of remotely sensed land surface temperatures, complicating their integration with ground-based data for surface flux predictions.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 挑战包括卫星数据与地面测量之间的空间和时间尺度差异，以及大气条件对遥感数据造成的潜在误差。此外，地形效应和云层覆盖可能影响遥感地表温度的准确性， complicating它们与地面数据在表面通量预测中的整合。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways could long-term observation datasets contribute to understanding oasis-desert ecosystem exchanges, and what are potential challenges in their collection?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 长期观测数据集可以通过哪些方式帮助理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统交换？在收集这些数据时可能面临哪些挑战？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Long-term observation datasets provide critical insights into the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges in oasis-desert ecosystems, which are key to achieving sustainable development and ecological balance. Challenges in their collection include maintaining consistent data quality over time, dealing with harsh environmental conditions, and ensuring comprehensive spatial coverage to capture the variability within these ecosystems.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 长期观测数据集为绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的能量、水汽和碳交换提供了关键的见解，这对实现可持续发展和生态平衡至关重要。收集这些数据面临的挑战包括保持数据质量的一致性、应对恶劣的环境条件，以及确保全面的空间覆盖以捕捉这些生态系统内的变异性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes challenges in measuring E and T in arid regions using current composite temperature separation approaches?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区使用当前的复合温度分离方法测量蒸散发（E）和蒸发（T）时，造成挑战的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The current composite temperature separation approaches are limited in their effectiveness in arid regions due to errors in image classification, which vary with vegetation abundance. This leads to misclassification, such as soil pixels being counted as vegetation pixels, resulting in an overestimation of canopy temperature. Additionally, ignoring atmospheric upwelling radiation and transmittance can cause uncertainties in estimated temperatures.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 当前的复合温度分离方法在干旱地区的有效性受到限制，主要是由于图像分类中的错误，这些错误随着植被丰度的变化而变化。这导致了误分类，例如土壤像素被计算为植被像素，从而导致对冠层温度的高估。此外，忽视大气向上辐射和透射率可能会导致温度估计的不确定性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it difficult to use satellite-derived data for continuous monitoring of surface fluxes at a regional scale?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么使用卫星获取的数据在区域尺度上进行表面通量的连续监测是困难的？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Satellite-derived data are challenging for continuous monitoring of surface fluxes at a regional scale because they are instantaneous and often contaminated by clouds. Additionally, the spatial and temporal scale mismatch between satellite data and ground measurements contributes to these difficulties. The terrain effect also affects the accuracy of land surface temperature retrievals from satellites.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 卫星衍生数据在区域尺度上对表面通量的连续监测具有挑战性，因为它们是瞬时的，并且常常受到云层的干扰。此外，卫星数据与地面测量之间的空间和时间尺度不匹配也加剧了这些困难。地形效应也影响了从卫星获取的地表温度的准确性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the challenges in maintaining ecological balance in oasis-desert systems in arid regions?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠系统中，维持生态平衡面临的挑战因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas face ecological degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensified land desertification, and frequent dust storms. These challenges are exacerbated by climate change and human activities, particularly in regions like the Tarim River basin and the Aral Sea basin.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态退化，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及频繁的沙尘暴。这些挑战因气候变化和人类活动而加剧，特别是在塔里木河流域和咸海流域等地区。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What consequences can arise from incorporating dual-pass data assimilation schemes in the prediction of surface fluxes using remotely sensed land surface temperature data?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在使用遥感地表温度数据预测表面通量时，采用双重数据同化方案可能会产生哪些后果？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Incorporating dual-pass data assimilation schemes can significantly reduce model uncertainties and improve the accuracy of surface flux predictions by optimizing soil moisture and vegetation parameters separately, thereby enhancing the reliability of surface flux predictions compared to traditional methods.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 采用双重数据同化方案可以显著减少模型不确定性，并通过分别优化土壤湿度和植被参数来提高表面通量预测的准确性，从而增强表面通量预测的可靠性，相较于传统方法。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What might be the implications of long-term energy, water vapor, and carbon flux observations for understanding oasis-desert system interactions?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 长期的能量、水蒸气和碳通量观测对理解绿洲-沙漠系统相互作用可能产生的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Long-term observations of energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes can provide critical insights into the energy balance and carbon exchange in oasis-desert systems, supporting sustainable development and ecological stability by contributing to carbon peaking and neutrality goals.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 长期观察能量、水汽和碳通量可以为绿洲-沙漠系统的能量平衡和碳交换提供重要见解，支持可持续发展和生态稳定，为实现碳达峰和碳中和目标做出贡献。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary objective behind developing observational datasets from oasis–desert systems for energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 开发来自绿洲-沙漠系统的观测数据集的主要目标是什么，以便进行能量、水汽和碳交换的研究？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objective is to understand the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems to achieve goals such as carbon peaking, carbon neutrality, ecological security, and sustainable development of oases.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，以实现碳达峰、碳中和、生态安全和绿洲可持续发展的目标。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to use high-resolution thermal cameras to validate E, T, and ET in studies involving the TSEB model?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在涉及TSEB模型的研究中，使用高分辨率热像仪验证E、T和ET是重要的原因是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Using high-resolution thermal cameras is important to obtain soil and canopy component temperatures, which help in accurately validating evaporation, transpiration, and evapotranspiration measurements, thereby improving the model’s reliability and applicability in heterogeneous landscapes.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 使用高分辨率热像仪对于获取土壤和冠层成分的温度至关重要，这有助于准确验证蒸发、蒸腾和蒸散发的测量，从而提高模型在异质景观中的可靠性和适用性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it necessary to implement a dual-pass data assimilation scheme for improving surface flux predictions using remotely sensed land surface temperature data?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 为什么有必要实施双重数据同化方案，以利用遥感地表温度数据改善地表通量预测？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The dual-pass data assimilation scheme is necessary to reduce model uncertainties and enhance surface flux predictions by independently optimizing soil moisture and vegetation parameters, thus improving the accuracy of flux predictions with the assimilation of land surface temperature data.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 双重通道数据同化方案是必要的，它通过独立优化土壤湿度和植被参数来减少模型不确定性并增强表面通量预测，从而通过同化地表温度数据提高通量预测的准确性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How is data assimilation used to enhance the prediction of land surface fluxes in arid and semi-arid regions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 数据同化如何用于增强干旱和半干旱地区地表通量的预测？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Data assimilation is used to enhance the prediction of land surface fluxes by integrating remote sensing data with land surface models. A dual-pass data assimilation scheme is employed, which independently optimizes model vegetation parameters and soil moisture using ensemble Kalman filter (EnKF) techniques. This involves assimilating land surface temperature data from satellites like FY3A-VIRR into models like CoLM, improving prediction accuracy by reducing model uncertainties and adjusting model state variables and parameters.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 数据同化用于通过将遥感数据与陆面模型结合，增强对陆面通量的预测。采用双重数据同化方案，独立优化模型的植被参数和土壤湿度，使用集合卡尔曼滤波（EnKF）技术。这涉及将来自FY3A-VIRR等卫星的陆面温度数据同化到CoLM等模型中，通过减少模型不确定性和调整模型状态变量及参数，提高预测准确性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methodologies are applied to partition evapotranspiration into evaporation and transpiration components using observational data?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 使用观测数据将蒸散发分为蒸发和蒸腾成分的常用方法有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To partition evapotranspiration into evaporation and transpiration components, methodologies such as the two-source energy balance (TSEB) model are applied using observational data. Ground-measured soil and canopy temperatures are used alongside isotopic techniques and eddy covariance system measurements to better validate and estimate these components. High-resolution thermal cameras and models like the Craig–Gordon model are also utilized to support the partitioning process by providing accurate temperature data and validating model outputs against field observations.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了将蒸散发分为蒸发和蒸腾两个组成部分，采用了诸如双源能量平衡（TSEB）模型等方法，利用观测数据。通过地面测量的土壤和冠层温度，以及同位素技术和涡度协方差系统测量，来更好地验证和估计这些组成部分。高分辨率热像仪和像克雷格-戈登模型这样的模型也被用来支持分割过程，通过提供准确的温度数据并将模型输出与现场观测进行验证。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What techniques and tools enable the accurate collection and processing of hydrometeorological and surface flux data in arid and semi-arid regions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术和工具能够在干旱和半干旱地区准确收集和处理水文气象和表面通量数据？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Techniques such as eddy covariance systems, scintillometers, and automatic weather stations are utilized to collect half-hourly turbulent flux data and hydrometeorological data. Instruments like thermal infrared cameras and remote sensing satellites are also used to measure surface temperatures and fluxes, which are then processed using data assimilation schemes like the dual-pass data assimilation to improve predictions of surface flux.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 技术如涡度协方差系统、闪烁仪和自动气象站被用来收集半小时的湍流通量数据和水文气象数据。热红外相机和遥感卫星等仪器也用于测量地表温度和通量，这些数据随后通过双重数据同化等数据同化方案进行处理，以改善地表通量的预测。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions or advancements facilitate the integration of satellite-derived land surface temperature data with field measurements for improved surface flux predictions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些条件或进展促进了卫星获取的地表温度数据与实地测量的整合，以改善地表通量预测？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The integration of satellite-derived land surface temperature (LST) data with field measurements is facilitated by advancements in satellite technology like the FY3A-VIRR and techniques such as ensemble Kalman filter (EnKF) data assimilation. These enable the optimization of model parameters and states, improving the accuracy of surface flux predictions across various climatological conditions.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 卫星衍生的地表温度（LST）数据与实地测量的集成得益于卫星技术的进步，如FY3A-VIRR，以及集成卡尔曼滤波（EnKF）数据同化等技术。这些技术能够优化模型参数和状态，提高在各种气候条件下表面通量预测的准确性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the eddy covariance system not achieve full energy balance closure in strongly advective irrigated agricultural areas?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么涡动协方差系统在强烈的平流灌溉农业区域可能无法实现完全的能量平衡闭合？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Accurately estimating surface fluxes in such areas is challenging due to the incomplete energy balance closure of the eddy covariance system concerning the available energy. This is primarily affected by the uncertainty in the surface–air temperature difference and errors in determining the surface soil and vegetation component temperatures from composite radiometric temperature.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 在这些区域准确估计表面通量是具有挑战性的，因为涡度协方差系统在可用能量方面的能量平衡闭合性不完整。这主要受到表面与空气温差的不确定性以及从复合辐射温度中确定表面土壤和植被组分温度的误差的影响。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What challenges might arise when using satellite-derived land surface temperature data for continuous monitoring of surface fluxes?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 使用卫星获取的地表温度数据进行地表通量的连续监测时可能会出现哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Challenges include the instantaneous nature of satellite data, potential contamination by clouds, and biases caused by spatial and temporal scale mismatches between satellite data and ground measurements. Additionally, terrain effects can affect the accuracy of satellite-derived land surface temperature retrievals.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 挑战包括卫星数据的瞬时性、云层可能造成的污染，以及卫星数据与地面测量之间的空间和时间尺度不匹配所导致的偏差。此外，地形效应也会影响卫星获取的地表温度的准确性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What is your assessment of the challenges faced in accurately estimating evapotranspiration in heterogeneous landscapes using current modeling approaches?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 我对在异质景观中使用当前建模方法准确估计蒸散发所面临的挑战的评估是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Accurately estimating evapotranspiration in heterogeneous landscapes is challenged by the complexity of modeling energy exchanges in mixed soil and vegetation surfaces, particularly in arid regions. The limitations of composite temperature separation approaches and the difficulty in measuring ground-based E and T contribute to the uncertainty, necessitating further refinement of models like TSEB to improve the estimation accuracy.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 在异质景观中准确估计蒸散发面临挑战，特别是在干旱地区，混合土壤和植被表面能量交换建模的复杂性使得这一过程更加困难。复合温度分离方法的局限性以及地面蒸发和蒸腾的测量困难增加了不确定性，这需要进一步完善像TSEB这样的模型，以提高估计的准确性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How well do you think current methodologies for data collection and processing address the ecological stability and carbon balance in arid oasis-desert ecosystems?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 你认为当前的数据收集和处理方法在多大程度上解决了干旱绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的生态稳定性和碳平衡问题？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Current methodologies, including long-term observational datasets from oasis-desert systems and the use of eddy covariance systems, provide critical insights into energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges. However, challenges such as ecological degradation and the need for continuous monitoring highlight the importance of maintaining a balance between oasis and desert systems to support sustainable development and carbon neutrality goals.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 当前的方法论，包括来自绿洲-沙漠系统的长期观测数据集和涡度协方差系统的使用，为能量、水蒸气和碳交换提供了重要的见解。然而，生态退化和持续监测的需求等挑战突显了维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间平衡的重要性，以支持可持续发展和碳中和目标。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about how the challenges of image classification errors affect the accuracy of temperature estimation in this domain.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定图像分类错误的挑战如何影响该领域温度估计的准确性。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Image classification errors can lead to inaccuracies in estimating component temperatures. These errors vary with vegetation abundance and may cause overestimation of canopy temperature due to misclassification of soil pixels as vegetation pixels. Additionally, ignoring atmospheric upwelling radiation and transmittance can introduce further uncertainties in temperature estimates.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 图像分类错误可能导致组件温度估计的不准确。这些错误随着植被丰度的变化而变化，可能会由于将土壤像素误分类为植被像素而导致对冠层温度的过高估计。此外，忽略大气向上辐射和透射率也可能引入温度估计的进一步不确定性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how a dual-pass data assimilation scheme can improve predictions of surface fluxes.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解双重通道数据同化方案如何改善地表通量的预测。
Assertion.AnswerEn: A dual-pass data assimilation scheme uses a two-step process to independently optimize model parameters and states. This scheme first optimizes vegetation parameters at a weekly scale and then optimizes soil moisture at a daily scale, using land surface temperature data from satellite sources. This approach reduces model uncertainties and enhances surface flux predictions by integrating remote sensing data to adjust model simulations.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 双重通道数据同化方案采用两步过程独立优化模型参数和状态。该方案首先在每周尺度上优化植被参数，然后在每日尺度上优化土壤湿度，使用来自卫星源的地表温度数据。这种方法通过整合遥感数据来调整模型模拟，减少模型不确定性并增强地表通量预测。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please summarize the data collection techniques employed for measuring energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes in oasis–desert areas.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 总结用于测量绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水蒸气和碳通量的数据收集技术。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The data collection techniques involve using eddy covariance systems and scintillometers to acquire half-hourly turbulent flux data. Additionally, hydrometeorological data are collected from automatic weather stations at a 10-minute average period, which includes radiation, soil heat flux, soil temperature profiles, air temperature, humidity gradients, wind speed and direction, air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles. Vegetation and soil parameters are also supplemented in the datasets.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 数据收集技术包括使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取半小时的湍流通量数据。此外，还从自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期收集水文气象数据，包括辐射、土壤热通量、土壤温度剖面、空气温度、湿度梯度、风速和风向、气压、降水量和土壤湿度剖面。植被和土壤参数也被补充到数据集中。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the challenges faced in estimating surface fluxes using remote sensing and field measurements in arid regions.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 分析在干旱地区使用遥感和现场测量估算表面通量所面临的挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Challenges in estimating surface fluxes include the difficulty of using satellite-derived data for continuous monitoring due to instantaneous measurements and cloud contamination. Additionally, the mismatch in spatial and temporal scales between satellite data and field measurements, terrain effects, and energy imbalances in the measurements can cause deviations. These challenges are further compounded by the heterogeneity of the underlying surfaces and the short memory of land surface temperature, which complicates data assimilation processes.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 估计表面通量的挑战包括由于瞬时测量和云污染而导致的使用卫星衍生数据进行连续监测的困难。此外，卫星数据与现场测量之间的空间和时间尺度不匹配、地形效应以及测量中的能量不平衡可能导致偏差。这些挑战因基础表面的异质性和地表温度的短期记忆而进一步加剧，这使得数据同化过程变得复杂。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore potential data integration strategies that could enhance the accuracy of surface flux predictions in heterogeneous land surfaces.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨可能的数据集成策略，以提高对异质土地表面表面通量预测的准确性。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: One potential strategy involves employing a dual-pass data assimilation scheme that optimizes vegetation parameters and soil moisture independently at different temporal scales using remotely sensed land surface temperature data. This approach uses an ensemble Kalman filter to assimilate data, improving predictions by reducing model uncertainties. Integrating field measurements from various sites with different climatological conditions can also help validate and refine model simulations, enhancing the overall accuracy of surface flux predictions.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 一种潜在的策略是采用双重数据同化方案，利用遥感地表温度数据在不同时间尺度上独立优化植被参数和土壤湿度。这种方法使用集合卡尔曼滤波器进行数据同化，通过减少模型不确定性来提高预测精度。整合来自不同气候条件下多个地点的实地测量数据也有助于验证和完善模型模拟，从而增强地表通量预测的整体准确性。
